subject: Management
title: Building Conflict Competence
description: A micro-lesson that makes Building Conflict Competence usable.

hook.text: A team that once dreaded disagreements started seeking them out. Their results jumped 40%.

buildup.text: Conflict competence isn't about enjoying conflict. It's about not fearing it.

discovery.text: It's a skill set: recognizing triggers, managing emotions, listening deeply, and finding solutions.

twist.text: Like any skill, it gets easier with practice. The first hard conversation is the worst. The tenth is manageable.

climax.text: Train your team in conflict skills. Role-play tough conversations. Normalize the discomfort.

punchline.text: Conflict gets easier. You just have to practice it.

quiz.question: What is conflict competence?
options: The skill of handling disagreements effectively without fear
The ability to win every argument through superior logic
Knowing how to avoid all conflict in a team
